# BuffConfigurator.For method

Returns a configurator for the given blueprint.

```csharp
public static BuffConfigurator For(string name)
```

## Remarks

Use this function if the blueprint exists in the game library. If you're using [WrathModifiationTemplate](https://github.com/OwlcatOpenSource/WrathModificationTemplate) your JSON blueprints should already exist.
